text: avare (satrukkale) allahu ninakk ninre svapnattil kuracc per matramayi kaniccutannirunna sandarbham (orkkuka.) ninakk avare adhikamayi kaniccirunnenkil ninnalute dhairyam ksayikkukayum, karyattil ninnal bhinnikkukayum ceyyumayirunnu. pakse allahu raksiccu. tirccayayum avan hrdayannalilullat ariyunnavanakunnu
